properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:46PM MST until January 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of 9 to 13 inches. For the Winter Weather
Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches.

* WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and
Pierce.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 AM Sunday to 10
AM PST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Sunday
afternoon through Sunday night.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST MONDAY
